text: innum, ninkal avarkalitam aratal perutarkuriya (unkal) manaiviyarai unkalilirunte unkalukkaka avan pataittiruppatum; unkalukkitaiye uvappaiyum, kirupaiyaiyum untakkiyiruppatum avanutaiya attatcikalil ullatakum; cintittu unarakkutiya camukattirku niccayamaka, itil (pala) attatcikal irukkinrana
